citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:50am-11:20am
on 11/4/2024. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee/registrant by Knocked on the door, honked horn, called the
contact number and left voicemail.. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a
serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b)  Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:50am-11:20am 
on 11/4/2024. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee/registrant by Knocked on the door, honked horn, called the 
contact number and left voicemail.. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a 
serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
